title: [MSBuild Server] Cover MSBuild server with tests
body:
Make sure that existing tests cover both the new (MSBuild server) and old/opt-out behavior. Introduce new end-to-end tests as appropriate.

Acceptance criteria: All code added as part of the feature is covered with tests.

Manual test scenarios:
- Non VT100 terminals
- Replay binlog
- Different SDKs in same MSBuild server proccess
- dotnet build with global.json specifying the other version of dotnet
- Set opt-in ENV and start VS to verify Nodes from VS works
